items.name: Malindi Wildlife Haven
items.short_description: Discover a diverse collection of local and exotic animals in a family-friendly environment. Kids can learn about conservation and interact with some gentle creatures.
items.address: Off Lamu Road, Near Malindi Airport, Malindi

items.name: Coastal Critter Farm
items.short_description: A charming petting zoo where children can feed and touch friendly farm animals like goats, rabbits, and chickens. Perfect for toddlers and young children.

items.name: Savanna Kids Animal Park
items.short_description: An interactive animal park designed to introduce children to Kenya's savanna wildlife through smaller, accessible exhibits and educational talks.

items.name: Malindi Exotic Birds Aviary
items.short_description: Step into a vibrant aviary housing colorful and rare bird species from around the world. Enjoy bird feeding sessions and learn about avian life.
items.address: Along Vasco da Gama Road, Malindi

items.name: Enchanted Baobab Forest
items.short_description: Wander through a magical forest filled with whimsical baobab trees, secret paths, and characters from African folklore. A truly enchanting experience for young imaginations.

items.name: Princess & Pirate Cove
items.short_description: A themed park where kids can choose their adventure: become a brave pirate searching for treasure or a graceful princess in a royal court. Costumes encouraged!

items.name: Mythical Creatures Lagoon
items.short_description: Discover a hidden lagoon where mythical creatures from various cultures come to life through interactive displays and storytelling. A unique blend of education and fantasy.

items.name: Storybook Safari World
items.short_description: Embark on a gentle 'safari' through beloved children's storybook settings, meeting characters along the way. Perfect for very young children.

items.name: Malindi Ocean Wonders Aquarium
items.short_description: Dive into the depths of the Indian Ocean without getting wet! This aquarium showcases vibrant coral reefs, exotic fish, and larger marine life native to the coast.
items.address: Next to Malindi Marine National Park, Malindi

items.name: Coral Reef Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive center focused on the delicate beauty and importance of coral reefs. Kids can learn about different coral species and the creatures that call them home.

items.name: Mangrove Marine Life Lab
items.short_description: Explore the unique ecosystem of Malindi's mangrove forests. This specialized aquarium features mudskippers, crabs, and juvenile fish that thrive in this vital habitat.

items.name: Deep Sea Explorer's Gallery
items.short_description: A simulated journey to the deep sea, showcasing mysterious creatures and bioluminescent wonders rarely seen. Engaging exhibits make oceanography exciting for kids.

items.name: Mystic Sands Magic Theatre
items.short_description: Prepare to be amazed by a captivating magic show featuring dazzling illusions and mind-bending tricks. A family-friendly performance that will leave everyone wondering how it was done.

items.name: The Grand Malindi Illusionist
items.short_description: Witness the incredible feats of Malindi's premier illusionist, performing grand-scale magic that defies explanation. Interactive elements ensure kids are part of the spectacle.

items.name: Coastal Conjurer's Den
items.short_description: A more intimate magic experience where close-up tricks and engaging storytelling create a sense of wonder. Kids can learn simple magic tricks too!

items.name: Safari Sorcery Show
items.short_description: A unique magic show with an African safari theme, featuring tricks inspired by wildlife and local legends. Fun for all ages with a cultural twist.
items.address: Parkview Gardens, Off Lamu Road, Malindi

items.name: Malindi Stargazers Dome
items.short_description: Journey through the cosmos in Malindi's interactive planetarium, designed specifically for young astronomers. Explore planets, stars, and galaxies with engaging shows.
items.address: Malindi Science & Discovery Park, Off Casuarina Road

items.name: Cosmic Kids Observatory
items.short_description: A mini-observatory and planetarium for children to discover the wonders of the night sky. Features age-appropriate shows and hands-on activities.
items.address: Malindi Youth Centre, Vasco da Gama Road

items.name: Galaxy Explorer's Planetarium
items.short_description: Blast off into space with immersive 360-degree projections. This planetarium takes kids on an adventurous tour of the solar system and beyond, answering all their cosmic questions.

items.name: Night Sky Adventure Centre
items.short_description: Combines a small planetarium with interactive exhibits on space travel and astronaut training. Inspires young minds to reach for the stars.

items.name: Malindi Discovery Lab
items.short_description: An interactive science center where kids can conduct experiments, explore engineering challenges, and uncover the mysteries of the natural world through hands-on activities.
items.address: Off Lamu Road, Near Malindi Airport, Malindi

items.name: Coastal Science Explorers
items.short_description: Focusing on marine biology, geology, and local ecology, this center offers engaging exhibits that teach children about Malindi's unique coastal environment.
items.address: Behind Malindi Marine Park Office, Malindi

items.name: Little Inventors Workshop
items.short_description: A creative hub where children can design, build, and test their own inventions using various materials and tools. Fosters innovation and problem-solving skills.

items.name: Malindi Eco-Science Interactive Museum
items.short_description: Learn about sustainable living, renewable energy, and the science behind our planet. Exhibits are designed to be both fun and educational for all ages.

items.name: Brick Builders Beach Town
items.short_description: A vast indoor space filled with millions of LEGO bricks, where children can construct their own Malindi-inspired city or fantastical creations. Workshops available.

items.name: Malindi Mega Blocks Park
items.short_description: Giant building blocks await! This outdoor park lets younger children build large structures, forts, and even vehicles with oversized, soft construction blocks.

items.name: Construct & Create Cove
items.short_description: More than just bricks, this park offers various construction materials like magnetic tiles, K'nex, and wooden blocks for diverse building challenges and imaginative play.
items.address: Off Vasco da Gama Road, Malindi

items.name: Engineer's Sandbox City
items.short_description: An open-air construction zone with diggers, cranes, and large sandpits for kids to operate miniature construction equipment and build epic sandcastles and cities.

items.name: Jungle Gym Jamboree
items.short_description: A multi-level indoor play structure with slides, ball pits, climbing walls, and obstacle courses. Safe and exhilarating fun for energetic kids in any weather.

items.name: Malindi Soft Play Palace
items.short_description: Designed for younger children, this center features a safe and soft environment with gentle slides, sensory play areas, and imaginative role-play zones.

items.name: Adventure Alley Playground
items.short_description: An exciting indoor playground featuring trampolines, a laser tag arena, and a challenging ninja warrior course. Perfect for older kids seeking thrills.
items.address: Off Lamu Road, Near Malindi Bypass

items.name: Bouncing Baobabs Fun House
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor space with bouncy castles, inflatable slides, and interactive games, all themed around the iconic baobab tree. Great for parties and casual play.

items.name: Safari Land Adventures
items.short_description: Embark on a mini-safari adventure with gentle rides, animal-themed attractions, and live character shows. A full day of family fun with an African twist.
items.address: Outskirts of Malindi, Off Malindi-Mombasa Highway

items.name: Pirate's Paradise Point
items.short_description: Ahoy, mateys! This pirate-themed park features a treasure hunt maze, a mini pirate ship ride, and swashbuckling shows. Dress up and join the crew!

items.name: Coconut Creek Carnival
items.short_description: A classic carnival experience with funfair rides, arcade games, and delicious treats. Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere and win prizes at this lively kid-friendly park.

items.name: Malindi Kids Kingdom
items.short_description: A whimsical kingdom designed for preschoolers and young children, with gentle rides, character meet-and-greets, and imaginative play areas.

items.name: Splashdown Lagoon
items.short_description: Malindi's premier water park for kids, featuring thrilling slides, a lazy river, and a splash pad for toddlers. Endless aquatic fun under the Malindi sun!
items.address: Off Lamu Road, Near Malindi Bypass

items.name: Aqua Fun Oasis
items.short_description: A medium-sized water park with a wave pool, several mid-sized slides, and a dedicated kids' area with shallow pools and spray features. Great for families.

items.name: Palm Tree Plunge Park
items.short_description: A tropical-themed water park offering a variety of body slides, tube rides, and a giant tipping bucket that drenches everyone below. Refreshing and exhilarating!

items.name: Malindi Rapids River
items.short_description: Enjoy a leisurely float down the 'rapids' in inner tubes, or explore the splash zones and mini-slides designed for younger children. A relaxing yet fun water experience.
